definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Edward always gets heebie jeebies from deadlines.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华总是对截止日期神经过敏。

sentences.english: Disordered nerves and bad digestion are a common cause of backbiting.
sentences.chinese: 神经过敏和承担力差是生成流言蜚语的常见原因。

sentences.english: The excitement brought her out in a nervous rash.
sentences.chinese: 激动使她全身出神经过敏的皮疹。

sentences.english: In addition, they experienced decreased neuroticism, or negative emotionality.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他们还体验到神经过敏和负面情绪的减少。

sentences.english: Disordered nerves and bad digestion are a common cause of backbiting.
sentences.chinese: 神经过敏和承受力差是产生流言蜚语的常见原因。

sentences.english: He was always a 'nervous' person but more so since the onset of palpitation.
sentences.chinese: 他老是神经过敏，自从心悸发生后更加厉害。

sentences.english: He was as nervous as a witch and as cross as a bear .
sentences.chinese: 他象巫婆一样神经过敏，像熊一样横蛮凶狠。

sentences.english: Paul: You might want to be careful with that. You seem a little jittery .
sentences.chinese: 你可能想对那事小心点，你像是有点神经过敏。

definition: man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
lit. every tree or bush an enemy soldier (idiom); fig. to panic and treat everyone as an enemy/to feel beleaguered
lit. to see a bow reflected in a cup as a snake (idiom); fig. unnecessary suspicions/overly fearful
